messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
There's an armed robbery going on right now. I've been shot in the back and I'm bleeding.
You've been shot in the back? Stay on the phone with me. Is the person still there?
Yes.
Okay. Male or female?
Male.
What race?
I think he's Hispanic.
Male Hispanic. What color shirt is he wearing?
I don't know. I'm not looking.
Is he wearing a mask?
Yes.
Is it a black mask?
Yes.
Is he still inside?
Yes, I think.
Just stay on the phone with me. Do not hang up. Can you see him and does he know that you're on the phone?
I don't know.
Okay, just be quiet then. I'll ask you yes or no questions, okay?
Okay.
The person who shot you, where is he?
I don't know. I think he left.
The robber left or the guy who was shot?
I think the robber left out the back door.
Okay, lock the doors. Did you get a description from anyone who saw him?
They ran. There were two of them.
There were two? Were they both wearing masks?
Yes.
Two suspects, both wearing masks, took off out the back door on foot. Don't hang up with me. Where's the person who was shot?
He's outside.
Is that a customer or a robber?
No, he's my manager.
Okay, I'm going to give you some instructions to help him, okay?
Okay.
Get a clean cloth and apply direct pressure to the wound. Do you understand?
Yes, I understand.
Two victims, one inside and one out back. Can you tell me the condition of the person outside?
I have no clue.
What color shirts were the suspects wearing?
One was in a blue shirt, and the other was in a dark green shirt.
How about pants?
The one in the blue shirt had camouflage pants.
Okay, so blue shirt with camouflage pants. The one in the green shirt?
He had tan shorts and shaggy hair.
Okay, you're doing great. Just stay with me. A police officer is on their way. Let me know when they get there.
A police lady is already here.
Okay, until she starts talking to you, keep talking to me. Are the suspects both Hispanic?
Yeah, they both looked Hispanic or black, I'm not sure. They were wearing masks.
Alright, we have help on the way. You can talk to the officers now.
Okay, thank you.
